name: Diced-Up
description:
Welcome... to Diced-Up!

This project was composed for the 2022 LowRezJam hosted by JackOatley and Gurpreet Singh Matharoo, so thank you to them for the opportunity to make this game!

-----------------

  • Slice up a grid of dice to defeat your enemies!
  • Level up and unlock absolutely nothing but a new and even bigger number!

-----------------

Note: This game was initially set to be created in a two-week period, however, due to certain circumstances, it was instead put together in three or so days, so I apologize for it being such an unfinished project. Development may be continued in the future!
